start.text: This officer is preparing weapon systems.

start_boss.text: This officer is preparing for major engagement.
This officer is readying for hostile contact.

retreat.text: This officer must return to the rearlines.

out_of_missiles.text: This officer reports missiles are empty.

engaged.text: This officer is reporting enemy contact.

hull_90.text: This officer reports minor ship damage.

hull_50.text: This officer reports major ship damage.

hull_30.text: This officer reports critical ship damage.

overload.text: This officer reports the ship has overloaded.

victory.text: This officer reports an end of engagement.
